entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 12.7°C
